title: The Hillman Group 375295 Hex Washer, Head Slotted Tapper Concrete Screw Anchor, 1/4 x 2-1/4-Inch, 100-Pack
features: State Of The Art Thread Design Cuts Into Concrete
Tapper Screws Are Designed For Fastening Applications In Concrete, Block And Brick
Use Tapper Screws To Attach Electrical Equipment, Two By Fours, Downspout Straps, Hose Reels, Flag Poles, Hurricane Shutters And More
From The Brand Name: The Hillman Group
description: State of the art thread design cuts into concrete. Tapper screws are designed for fastening applications in concrete, block and brick. Use Tapper screws to attach electrical equipment, two by fours, downspout straps, hose reels, flag poles, hurricane shutters and more. Tapper screws are perfect for indoor and outdoor use. For light to medium duty applications.
